name: Ini Abasi Ekanem
description:
Ini Abasi Ekanem is a Nigerian Blockchain and Cryptocurrency researcher, writer and author of  "FTX: Trading the Future with Tokenized Stocks".

 With over four years of researching and writing about blockchain and cryptocurrencies, Ini Abasi has a unique voice that speaks loudly to educate people about blockchain innovation and cryptocurrencies. Ini Abasi has written blockchain academic articles and has collaborated with blockchain projects including SPAC, DhdBank, Atomic Wallet, CoindustApp and many more. Ini Abasi writes books that you won't be able to put down.
